title: "setup.py install" and "setup_caffe2.py install" give different CUDA version detection
body_html:
Iong ago,I have uninstall cuda 7.5 and installed cuda 9.0,but

sudo python setup_caffe2.py install
gives:
Caffe2: CUDA detected: 7.5

sudo python setup.py install
gives:
Caffe2: CUDA detected: 9.0

my configuration:
ubuntu 16.04
cmake 3.5.1
source code head:00b5d397aef410f5926cb50e7d6e4e676aef71a8

body:
Iong ago,I have uninstall cuda 7.5 and installed cuda 9.0,but

`sudo python setup_caffe2.py install`
gives:
`Caffe2: CUDA detected: 7.5`

`sudo python setup.py install`
gives:
`Caffe2: CUDA detected: 9.0`

my configuration:
ubuntu 16.04
cmake 3.5.1
source code head:00b5d397aef410f5926cb50e7d6e4e676aef71a8
